import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Container, Carousel, Button, Image, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Calculator() { const [insurancePremium, setInsurancePremium] = useState(0); const [selectedPlan, setSelectedPlan] = useState(null); const [addOns, setAddOns] = useState({ claimsDefault: false, cyberRisks: false, lossKeys: false, courtesyDamage: false, pureFinancialLoss: false, sportsLeisureDamage: false, }); const handlePlanSelect = (plan) => { let basePremium = 0; if (plan === 'plan1') basePremium = 200; if (plan === 'plan2') basePremium = 500; if (plan === 'plan3') basePremium = 800; let addOnPremium = Object.values(addOns).filter(Boolean).length * 100; setSelectedPlan(plan); setInsurancePremium(basePremium + addOnPremium); }; const handleAddOnChange = (event) => { const { id, checked } = event.target; setAddOns(prevState => { const newAddOns = { ...prevState, [id]: checked }; let basePremium = 0; if (selectedPlan === 'plan1') basePremium = 200; if (selectedPlan === 'plan2') basePremium = 500; if (selectedPlan === 'plan3') basePremium = 800; let addOnPremium = Object.values(newAddOns).filter(Boolean).length * 100; setInsurancePremium(basePremium + addOnPremium); return newAddOns; }); }; return (

  • Internet Damage
  • Pet Damage

); } export default Calculator;
